name: porcupine-web-demo
description: A basic demo to show how to use Porcupine for web browsers, using the IIFE version of the library

scripts.postinstall: yarn copyppn && npx pvbase64 -i ../../lib/common/porcupine_params.pv -o ./porcupine_params.js && npx pvbase64 -i "./papaya whip_wasm.ppn" -o papaya_whip.js -n papayaWhip

author: Picovoice Inc
